Title: The Cadet Blue Kennebec Print Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Freshen up your business rotation with The Kennebec This refined style features a high quality cotton blend with a dash of stretch to keep you comfortable A small geo print adds visual interest while the silky smooth fabric lends a polished look and feel Whether you re heading back to the office or want to look sharp on your next video conference The Kennebec is a versatile addition to the wardrobe Fabric 77 Cotton 20 Polyester 3 Stretch sourced from the world s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Length Regular for tucked in wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Navy Brenton Check Dress Shirt

Title: The White Penbrooke Wrinkle Free Twill Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>We ve spent years testing wrinkle free fabrics and never found that they met the standard of how a Ledbury shirt should feel That is until now The Penbrooke is our first wrinkle free shirt perfect for on the go wear and travel When you re at home you can pull the Penbrooke right out of the dryer and wear it with confidence Woven with 100 cotton twill this innovative fabric will feel like all your favorite dress shirts Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world s finest mills Collar The Ledbury Quintessential collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Length Regular for tucked in wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The White Draper Hidden-Button Dress Shirt

Title: The White Bancroft Poplin Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It s time to rethink what you know about luxury poplin Introducing our most luxurious white shirt yet The Bancroft Poplin is composed of Gatsby Egyptian cotton known for its strength and ultrafine yarn size Renowned Italian mill Thomas Mason grows this incredible cotton on the banks of the Nile River and crafted this rich poplin with an incredibly soft feel and light weight A perfect shirt for any formal or business occasion all year round Fabric 100 Egyptian Cotton sourced from luxury Italian mill Thomas Mason Collar The Ledbury Mid Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a trim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>15 / 34 - Classic</string><variant>31506840715351</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34 - Classic</string><variant>29459814416471</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35 - Classic</string><variant>29459814449239</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35 - Classic</string><variant>29459814482007</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>17 / 36 - Classic</string><variant>29459814514775</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36 - Classic</string><variant>29459814547543</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>18 / 37 - Classic</string><variant>29459814580311</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>18.5 / 37 - Classic</string><variant>29459814613079</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15 / 34 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814645847</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814678615</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814711383</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814744151</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17 / 36 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814776919</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814842455</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Light Blue Harlan Cotton Linen Stripe Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This seasons best stripe Woven by the experts at Somelos in Portugal The Harlan Stripe is made of 85 cotton and 15 linen and woven in a loose textured weave for loads of airflow Featuring thin blue horizontal stripes this is the ultimate summery nautical inspired shirt Stay sharp and keep cool this summer in a cotton linen style like The Harlan Stripe Fabric 85 Cotton 15 Linen sourced from Somelos in Portugal Collar The button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Length Shortened for untucked or tucked wear Fit Available in tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>15 / 34</string><variant>31306529701975</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34</string><variant>31306529734743</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35</string><variant>31306529767511</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35</string><variant>31306529800279</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>17 / 36</string><variant>31306529833047</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>17.5 / 36</string><variant>31306529865815</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Pool Blue Kirby Gingham Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>A spring summer classic Add this vibrant pool blue check to your warm weather wardrobe and you ll stay sharp and comfortable all day long Crafted with a smooth crisp and soft poplin sourced from Somelos in Portugal this is a must have dress shirt for the season Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Somelos in Portugal Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Pink Fairford Performance Check Casual Shirt

Title: The Ivory Short Sleeve Knollwood Print Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Say hello to your new Hawaiian shirt This ultra soft Italian cotton is loosely woven for a breathable super lightweight feel The experts at Albini designed this fabric with a unique detail the palm pattern is created using a discharge print process creating the palm print by printing the negative space around it This versatile short sleeve shirt is perfect for backyard barbecues a walk on the beach and everything summer has in between Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albini in Italy Collar Button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Hem Balanced hem for untucked wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Buttons reinforced with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: Rains Green Short Hooded Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Short Hooded Coat features a straight body large pockets with button flaps ventilation airholes and a string detail along the hemline The style is completed with a drawstring hood featuring Rains signature built in cap Made from waterproof matte PU this lightweight rain jacket is an ode to nostalgia through its classic silhouette and utilitarian design details 64 polyester 36 polyurethane Water column pressure 4000 mm Drawstring hood with built in cap Front placket with snap buttons Ventilation under armpit Adjustable cuffs Double welted front pockets Adjustable elastic string at hemline Ultrasonically welded seamsRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105482839</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105515607</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105548375</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351105581143</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Designed for the seasons between seasons this jacket has been designed to offer warmth when the temperature starts to drop Trekker Jacket carries out Rains waterproof breathable PU in horizontally welted quilt lines across both the chest and sleeves Running along the side is a non quilted insulated PU panel for increased mobility Trekker Jacket is finished with a bomber collar ribbed cuffs hidden side pockets with a snap button closure and a waterproof front zipper closure Shell 57 polyester 43 polyurethane Lining 100 Nylon Insulation layer 100 polyester Weather resistant hardware made of stainless steel and durable rubber Bomber collar Waterproof coil zipper Hidden pockets at side seam closed with snap button Rib cuffsRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105777751</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105810519</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105843287</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351105876055</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Rains Green Fleece Zip Puller
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Fleece Zip Puller has been created to act as an additional layer for dropping temperatures This in between layer has been designed to be worn over a base layer or under Rains outerwear Rains Fleece Zip Puller is constructed of a 280g m2 weft knitted two sided brushed polar fleece fabric The style also features a unique PU coating on the front and back yoke of the jacket to guard against inclement weather Body 100 weft knitted polyester polar fleece Yoke 100 waterproof polyurethane coating PU coated coil zipper Silicone puller Stand up collar Elasticated cuffs Elastic Adjustable cords at the hem Ventilation airholes at underarmRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105351767</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105384535</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105417303</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351105450071</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Rains Black Puffer Jacket
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Puffer Jacket is an insulated winter jacket from Rains Thermal category made from a breathable yet waterproof fabric Designed with seamless woven chambers the Puffer Jacket features featherless insulation providing warmth in extreme conditions The jacket is crafted with stainless steel and durable rubber trimmings welt pockets a padded hoodie and coated in Rains signature matte PU Shell 57 polyester 43 polyurethane Lining 100 Nylon Insulation 100 featherless insulation Weather resistant trimmings made of stainless steel and durable rubber Two spacious front welt pockets Drawstring padded hood Ultrasonically double welded seams Elastic cuffsRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105908823</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105941591</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105974359</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351106007127</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Tom Beckbe Tensaw ES for Ledbury
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Tensaw ES is our favorite jacket from our friends at Tom Beckbe This waxed cotton jacket is designed for the field city and everywhere in between The Tensaw ES has a durable 6oz waxed cotton shell an ideal weight for moderate climates that develops a rich patina over time A cotton liner inspired by Alabama red clay adds a touch of color to the interior and a collar lined with Bedford corduroy provides welcome protection from the cold Large front bellow pockets allow for ample storage and conceal additional welt pockets to keep hands warm A hidden Napoleon pocket provides discrete storage for cellphones and other valuables Featuring an exclusive custom cast Ledbury button snap Fabric Shell 100 Cotton Body Lining 100 Cotton Sleeve Lining 100 Polyester Fit Set in sleeves provide flattering structure through the shoulders while gusseted underarms a bi swing back and classic fit through the midsection allow for a full range of motion Rinse dirt and debris by hand with cold water and air dry Do not iron Do not bleach Do not dry clean Do not machine wash Do not use artificial heat to dry expose to open flames hang on radiators or wear on a heated seat Reproof waxed outer shell as needed nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>S</string><variant>30323313967191</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M</string><variant>30323313999959</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>L</string><variant>30323314032727</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>XL</string><variant>30323314065495</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>XXL</string><variant>30323314098263</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Blundstone Rustic Black Dress Chelsea Boot
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Premium leather boots in rustic black these 1308 boots are ideal for a variety of looks whether for dress boots and stylish evenings or durable boots for walking in the woods Find this and a range of Blundstone boots online Rustic black premium leather Black elastic side Durable TPU outsole Cushioned midsole for comfort SPS Max Comfort system for outstanding shock absorption Removable comfort footbed Lightweight and comfortable First remove any caked dirt on your boots with a soft bristled brush or damp cloth and leave your boots to air dry Please ensure that your boots are away from direct sunlight or any heaters as they will dry out the leather Apply leather polish spray or cream to the leather to help maintain your boots If you are using a polish for the first time try it on an inconspicuous area of the boot to check whether it alters the colour or appearance If using a polish apply a small amount of leather cleaner to a polishing cloth or brush and rub onto the shoe in circular motions nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: Andres All Weather Boot Black
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Andres All Weather Boot is our most anticipated boot of all time Handmade in an ethical family run factory in Le n Mexico the Andres features a water resistant natural oil based leather upper 1 25 heel and a studded rubber sole that will grip just about any terrain and last you for years to come We went the extra mile to include a gusseted tongue that allows you to withstand the elements yet keep your toes nice and dry Whether you re traveling from country to country or just getting things done around town the Andres All Weather Boot has you covered regardless of the conditions Water resistant natural oil based leather upper 1 25 heel Studded rubber sole Gusseted tongue Leather lining Soft leather insole Handmade in an ethical family run factory in Le n Mexico Fits true to size A taller boot means slightly less flexibility at first as there is more coverage and more leather to break in Give them some time and they will fit like a glove For a roomier fit we recommend sizing up a half size nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Kingstowne Kudu Leather Boot
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Introducing the first Ledbury footwear The Kingstowne Kudu Leather Boot is a collaborative creation with Rider Boot Co Made with a cool toned brown Waxy Kudu Leather each boot has natural grain blemishes so each boot is unique Featuring a Rapid construction with a full leather insole and midsole and a durable Dainite rubber sole these boots will last a lifetime Complete with full leather lining an espresso brown stretch inset stacked leather heels with a rubber toplift and a removable leather footbed These boots fit slightly larger than average we recommend sizing down size For example if you normally wear a size 10 5 we recommend a size 10 Made in Italy Material Uppers constructed from Waxy Kudu Leather full leather insole full leather midsole and rubber outsole Full leather lining Removable leather footbed Fit Pull on Chelsea boot style These boots fit slightly larger than average we recommend sizing down size For example if you normally wear a size 10 5 we recommend a size 10 Sizing Available in men s sizes 8 5 12 US sizing These boots require minimal maintenance as the leather will age and wear naturally Simply brush with a soft horsehair shoe brush as needed An occasional wipe with neatsfoot or cod liver oil can be used to condition the upper This will temporarily darken the leather Do not use hard wax or tinted shoe cream on this leather nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>8</string><variant>31310268825687</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>8.5</string><variant>31310268563543</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>9</string><variant>31310268596311</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>9.5</string><variant>31310268629079</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>10</string><variant>31310268661847</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>10.5</string><variant>31310268694615</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>11</string><variant>31310268727383</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>11.5</string><variant>31310268760151</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>12</string><variant>31310268792919</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Pecan Delmont Herringbone Sport Coat
